00058 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

00062     //We need to decalare an internal class to make this work.
00063     namespace internal
00064     {
00065         /// @internal
00066         /// @brief Does the bulk of the work that that the phys::LineGroup performs
00067         /// @details phys::LineGroup is a simple wrapper around this to perform precise
00068         /// low level interactions with Ogre, the rendering subsystem. This uses too much stuff
00069         /// from ogre to use publicly. so we need to hide it here in the phys::internal namespace.
00070         class Line3D: public SimpleRenderable
00071         {
00072             public:
00073                Line3D(void);
00074                ~Line3D(void);
00075 
00076                void addPoint(const Vector3 &p);
00077                const Vector3 &getPoint(Whole index) const;
00078                Whole getNumPoints(void) const;
00079                void updatePoint(Whole index, const Vector3 &value);
00080                void drawLine(Vector3 &start, Vector3 &end);
00081                void drawLines(void);        //Render this
00082 
00083                Real getSquaredViewDepth(const Camera *cam) const;
00084                Real getBoundingRadius(void) const;
00085             protected:
00086                //void getWorldTransforms(Matrix4 *xform) const;
00087                const Ogre::Quaternion &getWorldOrientation(void) const;
00088                const Vector3 &getWorldPosition(void) const;
00089 
00090                std::vector<Vector3> mPoints;
00091                bool mDrawn;     //Has this been rendered yet?
00092         };
00093 
00094         Line3D::Line3D(void)
00095         {
00096            mRenderOp.vertexData = new VertexData();
00097            mDrawn = false;
00098 
00099            this->setMaterial("BaseWhiteNoLighting");
00100         }
00101 
00102         Line3D::~Line3D(void)
00103         {
00104            delete mRenderOp.vertexData;
00105         }
00106 
00107         void Line3D::addPoint(const Vector3 &p)
00108         {
00109            mPoints.push_back(p);
00110         }
00111 
00112         const Vector3 &Line3D::getPoint(Whole index) const
00113         {
00114            assert(index < mPoints.size() && "Point index is out of bounds!!");
00115 
00116            return mPoints[index];
00117         }
00118 
00119         Whole Line3D::getNumPoints(void) const
00120         {
00121            return mPoints.size();
00122         }
00123 
00124         void Line3D::updatePoint(Whole index, const Vector3 &value)
00125         {
00126            assert(index < mPoints.size() && "Point index is out of bounds!!");
00127 
00128            mPoints[index] = value;
00129         }
00130 
00131         void Line3D::drawLine(Vector3 &start, Vector3 &end)
00132         {
00133            /// @todo TODO: when using this function there should be a break in the line segment rendering. Not sure abot the best way to implement that, but it should happen
00134            if(mPoints.size())
00135               mPoints.clear();
00136 
00137            mPoints.push_back(start);
00138            mPoints.push_back(end);
00139 
00140            drawLines();
00141         }
00142 
00143         void Line3D::drawLines(void)
00144         {
00145             if(mDrawn)
00146                 return;
00147             else
00148                 mDrawn = true;
00149 
00150             // Initialization stuff
00151             mRenderOp.indexData = 0;
00152             mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexCount = mPoints.size();
00153             mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexStart = 0;
00154             mRenderOp.operationType = RenderOperation::OT_LINE_STRIP; // OT_LINE_LIST, OT_LINE_STRIP
00155             mRenderOp.useIndexes = false;
00156 
00157             VertexDeclaration *decl = mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexDeclaration;
00158             VertexBufferBinding *bind = mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexBufferBinding;
00159 
00160             decl->addElement(POSITION_BINDING, 0, VET_FLOAT3, VES_POSITION);
00161 
00162             HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf =
00163               HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton().createVertexBuffer(
00164                  decl->getVertexSize(POSITION_BINDING),
00165                  mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexCount,
00166                  HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00167 
00168             bind->setBinding(POSITION_BINDING, vbuf);
00169 
00170             // Drawing stuff
00171             int size = mPoints.size();
00172             if( size > 0 )
00173             {
00174                Vector3 vaabMin = mPoints[0];
00175                Vector3 vaabMax = mPoints[0];
00176 
00177                Real *prPos = static_cast<Real*>(vbuf->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00178 
00179                for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00180                {
00181                   *prPos++ = mPoints[i].x;
00182                   *prPos++ = mPoints[i].y;
00183                   *prPos++ = mPoints[i].z;
00184 
00185                   if(mPoints[i].x < vaabMin.x)
00186                      vaabMin.x = mPoints[i].x;
00187                   if(mPoints[i].y < vaabMin.y)
00188                      vaabMin.y = mPoints[i].y;
00189                   if(mPoints[i].z < vaabMin.z)
00190                      vaabMin.z = mPoints[i].z;
00191 
00192                   if(mPoints[i].x > vaabMax.x)
00193                      vaabMax.x = mPoints[i].x;
00194                   if(mPoints[i].y > vaabMax.y)
00195                      vaabMax.y = mPoints[i].y;
00196                   if(mPoints[i].z > vaabMax.z)
00197                      vaabMax.z = mPoints[i].z;
00198                }
00199 
00200                vbuf->unlock();
00201 
00202                mBox.setExtents(vaabMin, vaabMax);
00203             }
00204 
00205         }
00206 
00207         Real Line3D::getSquaredViewDepth(const Camera *cam) const
00208         {
00209            Vector3 vMin, vMax, vMid, vDist;
00210            vMin = mBox.getMinimum();
00211            vMax = mBox.getMaximum();
00212            vMid = ((vMin - vMax) * 0.5) + vMin;
00213            vDist = cam->getDerivedPosition() - vMid;
00214 
00215            return vDist.squaredLength();
00216         }
00217 
00218         Real Line3D::getBoundingRadius(void) const
00219         {
00220            return Math::Sqrt(max(mBox.getMaximum().squaredLength(), mBox.getMinimum().squaredLength()));
00221            //return mRadius;
00222         }
00223         /*
00224         void Line3D::getWorldTransforms(Matrix4 *xform) const
00225         {
00226            // return identity matrix to prevent parent transforms
00227            *xform = Matrix4::IDENTITY;
00228         }
00229         */
00230         const Ogre::Quaternion &Line3D::getWorldOrientation(void) const
00231         {
00232            return Ogre::Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00233         }
00234 
00235         const Vector3 &Line3D::getWorldPosition(void) const
00236         {
00237            return Vector3::ZERO;
00238         }
00239     }// /internal

00245     LineGroup::LineGroup(World *Parent_)
00246     {
00247         this->Parent = Parent_;
00248         this->LineData = new internal::Line3D();
00249     }

00251     LineGroup::~LineGroup(void)
00252     {
00253         delete this->LineData;
00254     }
00255 
00256     void LineGroup::addPoint(const PhysVector3 &p)
00257     {
00258         this->LineData->addPoint( p.GetOgreVector3());
00259     }
00260 
00261     const PhysVector3 LineGroup::getPoint(Whole index) const
00262     {
00263         PhysVector3 temp(this->LineData->getPoint(index));
00264         return temp;
00265     }
00266 
00267     Whole LineGroup::getNumPoints(void) const
00268     {
00269         return this->LineData->getNumPoints();
00270     }
00271 
00272     void LineGroup::updatePoint(Whole index, const PhysVector3 &value)
00273     {
00274         return this->LineData->updatePoint(index, value.GetOgreVector3());
00275     }
00276 
00277     void LineGroup::drawLine(const PhysVector3 &start, const PhysVector3 &end)
00278     {
00279         Ogre::Vector3 Ostart = start.GetOgreVector3();
00280         Ogre::Vector3 Oend = end.GetOgreVector3();
00281         this->LineData->drawLine(Ostart, Oend );
00282     }
00283 
00284     void LineGroup::drawLines(void)
00285     {
00286         this->LineData->drawLines();
00287     }
00288 
00289     Real LineGroup::getBoundingRadius(void) const
00290     {
00291         return this->LineData->getBoundingRadius();
00292     }
00293 
00294     void LineGroup::PrepareForRendering()
00295     {
00296         SceneNode *myNode = this->Parent->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00297         myNode->attachObject(this->LineData);
00298     }
